items.content_html: A lightweight, flexible TypeScript library for building incremental games with support for generators, upgrades, playerState, and prestige mechanics.
items.title: mikelovesrobots/incremental-core: A lightweight, flexible TypeScript library for building incremental games with support for generators, upgrades, playerState, and prestige mechanics.

items.content_html: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support & streamlined local repository workflow. Open source & free. Made with Svelte.
items.title: sveltia/sveltia-cms: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support & streamlined local repository workflow. Open source & free. Made with Svelte.

items.content_html: A lightweight state machine implementation for Zustand state management. This library provides a simple yet powerful way to manage complex state transitions with features like guards, reducers, middleware, and hierarchical states.
items.title: exidz/zustand-fsm: A lightweight state machine implementation for Zustand state management. This library provides a simple yet powerful way to manage complex state transitions with features like guards, reducers, middleware, and hierarchical states.

items.content_html: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
items.title: ljt019/exhibit_manager: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.

items.content_html: An open-source, lightweight tier list creator. Craft custom rankings, use pre-made templates, and easily share your tier lists. No account needed - just create, rank, and share!

items.content_html: NanoMD is a lightweight Markdown editing and viewing library built on pure JavaScript and native APIs. Can be easily embedded into websites, offers rich features, and supports real-time previewing.
